articles.title: Lipton Unveils Bold New Look in First Major Rebrand in Over a Decade
articles.author: Newsource
articles.summary: Lipton is rebranding with a new logo, design, and packaging updates slated for 2025. This effort represents a business and heritage update within the beverage and tea industry.

articles.title: I Tried the Dyson Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer and Can Never Go Back. It's on Sale for Its Lowest Price Ever Right Now
articles.author: Macy Meyer
articles.summary: The Dyson Supersonic Nural hair dryer is currently on sale on Amazon for $399, representing a 20% discount from its usual price of $500.

articles.title: 41 Easy Breezy Summer Fashion Pieces You'll Look Hot In
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: Aerie offers a baby doll tank top for $28.45. Showpo is selling a two-piece linen set for $99.95. Nordstrom has wide-leg linen-blend pants available for $41.65. Target offers a flowy high-rise skort for $25. Lisa Says Gah sells a cami for $118. Old Navy provides a fit-and-flare taffeta dress for $34.99. Eloquii offers a gingham peplum top for $44.97. Asos has a fold-over bandeau dress for $34.99. Madewell offers a striped V-neck polo for $58. Urban Outfitters sells a ribbed square-neck tank for $19+. Lulus offers a crochet maxi skirt for $55 and matching top for $35. Sabo has a natural cotton top for $58. Free People is selling Morning Breeze shorts for $38. Amazon offers a V-neck blouse for $19.99. Express sells a high-neck, low-back top for $64.

articles.title: Snapchat partners with Chemist Warehouse on First Ads format for ‘Mayhem' sale
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Snapchat has launched a new ad format called First Snap, and Chemist Warehouse is the first Australian retailer to use it for their 'Mayhem' sale. The First Snap takeover allows Chemist Warehouse to reach Snapchat users in the Chat tab, offering discounts on a range of products.

articles.title: Fujifilm's X Half is a Gen Z camera with a Boomer price tag
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Fujifilm has announced the launch of its new compact digital camera, the X Half. The company states that this camera is designed to help people rediscover the experience of film photography in a digital format and aims to provide excitement and anticipation when capturing images.

articles.title: ​​Mister Car Wash Opens First Denver Location with Free Wash Weekend May 23–26
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Mister Car Wash has launched a new location in Denver, offering a free Titanium Wash from May 23rd to May 26th to celebrate the grand opening. Additionally, the first 500 guests signing up for the Unlimited Wash Club at the new location will receive a $5 gift card.

articles.title: Local juice shop opening new location in Stone Harbor
articles.author: John Russo
articles.summary: The Juice Pod is opening its 20th location in Stone Harbor on Friday, with a grand opening scheduled for 8 a.m. The first 50 customers will receive a free acai bowl and a branded tote bag. The Juice Pod offers various products including cold-pressed juices, superfood smoothies, acai bowls, salads, and wraps.

articles.title: Azerion Launches Open and Independent Multi-Cloud and AI Platform  May. 22, 2025 21:32
articles.summary: Azerion launched Azerion Intelligence, a new Multi-Cloud and AI platform offering affordable cloud hosting, open-source AI capabilities, and a marketplace of AI-powered apps for digital marketing and publishing. This platform provides access to open-source large language models and advanced AI agents for various marketing tasks, aiming to democratize AI for European businesses.

articles.title: nexAI Transforms Audience Planning and Discovery  May. 22, 2025 21:01
articles.summary: Nexxen introduced generative AI to the Nexxen Data Platform, featuring the nexAI Discovery assistant. The nexAI enables clients to turn consumer data into actionable audience profiles and streamlines campaign planning. The nexAI Discovery Assistant will be available to Nexxen Discovery users and allows users to generate audience reports.

articles.title: Celebrity-Endorsed Mila Foy Unveils Viral Formulations Redefining Beauty
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Mila Foy officially announces the launch of its groundbreaking product. The company is confident in their product's effectiveness, providing free samples.

articles.title: There's a new car wash in town
articles.summary: Jacks Car Spa has launched a new, high-tech car wash service. The service is attracting attention on social media due to its innovative approach.

articles.title: Ranked: One editor tested 8 lint rollers on pet hair and debris — this was her top pick
articles.author: Emma Stessman
articles.summary: Shop TODAY editor Amanda Fama reviewed various lint rollers, assessing their reusability, portability, and effectiveness. The lint rollers are evaluated on different fabrics and surfaces for removing lint and pet hair.  Several types, including washable, reusable, and disposable sheet rollers, are examined, providing insights into their performance and suitability for different needs and surfaces.

articles.title: GBFoods Redefines the Culinary Landscape with a Massive Five-Product Rollout
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: GBfoods Nigeria has launched five new products: Bama Shawarma Mix, Gino Asun-Flavoured Seasoning Cubes, Gino Asun-Flavoured Tomato Mix, Gino Red Hot Pepper Powder, and relaunched Jago Mayonnaise. These products aim to bring convenience, flavour, and innovation to consumers and food entrepreneurs, catering to local tastes with affordability and quality.

articles.title: Funky Fiat Grande Panda debuts hybrid derivative
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: Fiat launched the new Grande Punto as a hybrid. This new model, which debuted in June 2024, also includes full electric derivatives that were launched earlier in the year.

articles.title: Talk to Me, Amazon Shopping App: How AI Could Sort Through All the Products You're Looking At
articles.author: Alex Valdes
articles.summary: Amazon is trialing a new "hear the highlights" AI feature within its shopping app, providing short audio summaries of products to help users make informed purchase decisions. The feature analyzes product details, customer reviews, and other web information. Initially available to a subset of US customers on a limited number of products such as the Ninja Blender and OSEA Undaria Algae Body Oil, Amazon plans to roll it out more broadly in the coming months.

articles.title: Our Guide To The Best Washer & Dryer Combos In Canada In 2025 (And Where To Get Them)
articles.author: Julien Gandelin
articles.summary: The article highlights several washer and dryer combo models from companies like Samsung, LG, and GE. Specifically, the article mentions the Samsung 5.3 Cu. Ft. F900 Series Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, the LG WM6998HBA 5.7 Cu. Ft. High Efficiency Electric Washer & Dryer Combo, the Samsung WD53DBA900HZA1 6.1 Cu. Ft. Washer & Heat Pump Dryer Combo, the GE PFQ97HSPVDS 5.5 Cu. Ft. UltraFast Electric Washer & Dryer Combo, and the GE GFQ14ESSNWW 2.8 Cu. Ft. Electric Washer & Dryer Combo. The reviews cover various aspects such as capacity, cycle options, automated dispensing, energy efficiency, and smart features, with the combos designed for different needs and household sizes.

articles.title: Freshworks bets on agentic AI to drive enterprise growth in 2025
articles.author: Ajay Rag
articles.summary: Freshworks plans to launch agentic AI services by the end of 2025, expanding its AI capabilities. They are using foundation models to build their own stack and make it accessible. This expansion in AI capabilities is expected to influence the company's pricing model, moving towards value-based pricing.

articles.title: Amazon's £30 clothes airer 'holds a full load of washing' but 'takes up little space'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Minky 3 Tier Plus Clothes Airer for £29.98, reduced from £32. The airer offers 21 meters of drying space, a three-tier design, and is made from strong steel with non-slip feet. It has received positive reviews on Amazon for its sturdiness and space-saving design.

articles.title: Wonder is opening its first food hall in Cherry Hill next week. Here's what you need to know.
articles.author: Denali Sagner
articles.summary: Wonder is opening a new location in Cherry Hill with 18 restaurants, including Brooklyn's Di Fara Pizza and Bobby Flay Steak. The location will offer delivery across Camden and parts of Burlington Counties. The company currently has 13 locations in New Jersey with seven others on the way.

articles.title: Norton's new Neo browser wants to bring AI to the search bar
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Norton is launching a new browser, Norton Neo, which features AI prompting capabilities in addition to standard URL and search functions. The browser replaces the traditional search/URL bar with a 'magic box' for searching, generating content, and taking actions. Norton Neo differs from the existing Norton Private Browser by including AI features.

articles.title: Is this robot your future housemate? Tesla's Optimus robot cooks, cleans, and leaves the internet torn between awe and alarm
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Tesla's Optimus robot is demonstrated performing various domestic tasks like cooking and cleaning. The robot is trained using natural language instructions and by mimicking human actions from internet videos. This update aims to position Optimus as a versatile home assistant, though its current price point is around $20,000.

articles.title: Google made an AI content detector - join the waitlist to try it
articles.author: Webb Wright
articles.summary: Google launched SynthID Detector, a platform designed to quickly identify AI-generated content created by its generative models, including Gemini, Imagen, Lyria, and Veo. SynthID Detector uses invisible watermarks to detect AI-generated images, ensuring the watermarks remain even after modifications.

articles.title: This top-rated Dyson hair dryer is on sale for the lowest price yet on Amazon
articles.author: Allison Jewell
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a massive discount on the Dyson Supersonic hair dryer. This provides an incentive for those who have been wanting the product to now purchase it.

articles.title: ActiveCampaign Unveils Active Intelligence to Usher in a New Era of Marketing Automation
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ActiveCampaign introduced Active Intelligence, a new AI-driven user experience for its marketing automation platform. This launch includes the debut of over 12 AI agents and new WhatsApp capabilities and expanded SMS features for automated global messaging.  Additionally, ActiveCampaign announced a Wix partnership for a smarter, connected ecosystem, with details to be shared at the upcoming Innovation Keynote.

articles.title: NNPC doles out starter packs to 531 NYSC members
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: The Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited (NNPCL) provided starter packs to 531 National Youth Service Corps (NYSC) members. These starter packs included furniture-making kits, laptops, and fashion designing tools, designed to enable the recipients to start their own businesses or services.

articles.title: I Hated Smart Glasses Until I Tried Google's Android XR. Now I See the Potential
articles.author: Patrick Holland
articles.summary: Google is developing Android XR glasses, a prototype of which includes features like a camera, microphone, and sensors. The glasses allow users to take photos, interact with Gemini AI, and view information directly on the lenses. Google plans to collaborate with Warby Parker and Gentle Monster for frame designs.

articles.title: Amazon trials genAI-powered audio summaries for product pages
articles.author: Vishnu Priya N
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new feature employing LLMs to create concise audio summaries of products. This feature analyzes product details, customer reviews, and online information to generate short audio clips. The initial test focuses on products needing careful consideration, aiming to help Amazon customers shop more efficiently.

articles.title: Tata Motors launches all-new Altroz
articles.author: Uniindia News Service
articles.summary: Tata Motors launched the all-new Altroz, targeting middle-class consumers, at a starting price of Rs 6.89 lakh. The new Altroz features enhanced connectivity, expanded multi-powertrain line-up including an AMT option, and new design elements like flush door handles and Infinity connected LED tail lamps.

articles.title: Karnataka appoints Tamannaah Bhatia as Mysore Sandal Soap brand ambassador
articles.author: HT News Desk
org: Large and Medium Industries & Infrastructure Development
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) appointed actress Tamannaah Bhatia as the brand ambassador for Mysore Sandal Soap. This strategic decision aims to aggressively penetrate markets beyond Karnataka to increase the annual revenue to ₹5,000 crore by 2028.

articles.title: HH Global launches Nuevo: A game-changing creative agency built for the future of brand marketing
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: HH Global launched Nuevo, a creative ecosystem, to transform ideas into measurable brand experiences. Backed by HH Global's experts, Nuevo offers access to creative professionals, delivering connected creativity to address modern marketing challenges and help brands move faster and more efficiently.

articles.title: Espresso on autopilot: Elon Musk cheers Tesla owner brewing coffee while car drives itself
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: A Tesla owner showcased the capabilities of Tesla's Full Self-Driving (FSD) technology by brewing espresso while the car autonomously drove to the beach. Elon Musk responded to the video, endorsing the application of the autonomous technology.

articles.title: An Overview of Each Platform's AI Tools for Advertisers
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Various companies are introducing new AI-powered tools for ad creation and campaign management. Meta offers AI-powered creative options, aiming to automate ad generation. TikTok's Symphony platform builds campaigns based on product descriptions, utilizing trending content. X's Grok chatbot generates images and ad copy, incorporating variable inputs, while Pinterest automates image resizing and targeting. LinkedIn offers comprehensive AI tools, including visual and text generation, along with automated campaign types. Snapchat introduced AI-powered smart bidding and ad copy generation and AI-generated Sponsored Lenses , focusing on AR creation. Google provides fully-automated Performance Max campaigns and a new AI agent for ad creation and management.

articles.title: Glance AI Launches Cutting-Edge Visual Shopping Platform That Reimagines Consumer Discovery
articles.author: Dan Yoo
articles.summary: Glance, a consumer technology company, has launched Glance AI, an AI-native commerce platform that uses visual inspiration for online shopping. The platform creates personalized, photorealistic looks based on user uploads, leveraging AI to match users with products from over 400 brands. The platform integrates across various devices and has shown impressive early engagement metrics since its U.S. launch in early 2025.

articles.title: Learn Everything Before Buying on Amazon With Its New Audio Summaries
articles.author: Saikat Basu
articles.summary: Amazon is testing and launching a new AI-powered audio summary feature called "Hear the highlights" on its shopping app. This feature provides short audio clips of product highlights, approximately 30 seconds in length, that are available on select product pages. The AI scans reviews and web information to create natural, informative summaries to help customers make quicker purchase decisions.

articles.title: Anthropic's new hybrid AI model can work on tasks autonomously for hours at a time
articles.author: Rhiannon Williams
articles.summary: Anthropic is launching two new AI models: Claude Opus 4, marketed for complex challenges and available to paying customers, and Claude Sonnet 4, designed for everyday use and accessible to both paid and free users. Both models are hybrid, offering swift or deep responses and utilizing web search and other tools to enhance output.

articles.title: NetVRk Launches Web App for SilkAI, the Hyper-Intelligent AI Platform for Companions, Gaming, and Robotics in the Metaverse
articles.summary: NetVRk has launched the SilkAI web app, providing access to AI Non-Player Characters (NPCs) built in Unreal Engine 5. SilkAI allows users to personalize and deploy interactive NPCs across metaverse environments.  The app also facilitates the broader use of the upcoming $SILKAI token, which enables integration across platforms.

articles.title: HH Global launches Nuevo: A game-changing creative agency built for the future of brand marketing
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: HH Global launched Nuevo, an in-house creative agency designed to bridge the gap between brand thinking and scalable execution. Nuevo focuses on creative intelligence, technologies, and conscious creativity to provide connected solutions for clients navigating complex marketing supply chains. The agency's mission is to transform ideas into measurable brand experiences across channels and markets.

articles.title: Babelio Showcases Innovative Baby Safety and Sleep Solutions at ABC Kids Expo 2025
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Babelio is presenting its product lines at ABC Kids Expo 2025 and launching new products. These include the Pocket Mini White Noise Sound Machine, designed to aid sleep and soothe fussiness, and the Gallery Series Suction Baby Plate. Other products include Off-Roader Balance Bike, space-saving playpens, booster seats, carriers, slings, and swaddles.

articles.title: Savings.co.jp Enhances Platform to Help Tourists Save More While Shopping in Japan
articles.author: Send2Press
articles.summary: Savings.co.jp, a Japan-based savings platform, has launched upgrades to its coupon and discount listings to improve the speed and accuracy for international travelers. The upgrades include an enhanced manual verification process and reduced refresh interval for homepage deals, ensuring access to reliable, real-time savings information. The platform offers discounts from major retailers in categories like fashion, beauty, electronics, and groceries.

articles.title: Voice is Here: MetroList Agents Streamline Listings with Lundy-Powered App
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MetroList has launched a new add/edit app powered by Lundy, Inc., designed to streamline property data collection for real estate agents in Northern California. The voice-controlled app allows agents to verbally capture property details on-site, automatically populating listing fields, which saves time and improves listing quality.

articles.title: Tamannaah Bhatia's ₹6.2 crore deal as brand ambassador of Mysore Sandal Soap gets backlash; Karnataka minister defends
articles.author: Neeshita Nyayapati
articles.summary: Karnataka government selected Tamannaah Bhatia as the brand ambassador for Mysore Sandal Soap, manufactured by Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL). This decision is part of a strategy to penetrate markets beyond Karnataka and to achieve KSDL's vision of reaching 5000Cr Annual Revenue by 2028.

articles.title: Amazon trials genAI-powered audio summaries for product pages
articles.author: Global Data
articles.summary: Amazon is trialling a new feature that uses generative AI to create short-form audio summaries on select product detail pages. This feature, which analyzes product details and customer reviews, is currently available to a limited group of US customers. Amazon plans to expand the feature to more products and users in the coming months.

articles.title: My £219 Hoover is 'more effective' than a Dyson and reduced to £109 in Bank Holiday Sale
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: The Hoover HF9 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is now available with a significant discount, priced at £109 with the code POWERFUL. It features Anti-Twist technology, multiple cleaning modes, and LED lights to enhance cleaning performance. The Hoover HF9 is presented as a cost-effective alternative to brands like Dyson and Shark.

articles.title: What is retinol sandwiching — and should you try it?
articles.author: Bethany Heitman
articles.summary: The article discusses the "retinol sandwiching" skincare trend, involving applying moisturizer before and after retinol to reduce irritation. It recommends products such as RoC retinol serum, Neutrogena's Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Cream, and moisturizers from CeraVe and Kiehl's, highlighting their key ingredients and benefits for this technique.

articles.title: Google's New AI Puts Breasts on Minors—and J. D. Vance
articles.author: Lila Shroff
articles.summary: Google released an AI tool called "Try It On" which acts as a virtual dressing room allowing users to upload images and see how they look in selected garments. The tool draws from Google's 'Shopping Graph,' a dataset of more than 50 billion online products. It is available in the U.S. through Search Labs, a platform where Google lets users experiment with early-stage features.

articles.title: Best Of Top Face Wash Brand: Finest Picks In India To Not Miss For Refreshing Skin
articles.summary: Plum introduces a face wash with 2% niacinamide acid to fight dark spots and hyperpigmentation, improving skin texture with rice water and amino acids. Mama Earth's face wash contains turmeric and vitamin C for radiant skin and acne scar healing. Pilgrim's face wash uses Australian Vitamin C and Kakadu plum for even skin tone and anti-aging benefits. Cetaphil offers a gentle skin cleanser with niacinamide and vitamin B5, ideal for all skin types, fighting dryness and irritation.

articles.title: Walmart slashes price on OLED Nintendo Switch model ahead of Switch 2 release - Save $80
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Nintendo will release the Switch 2 console on June 5, 2025, with a price of $449. Walmart is currently offering the Nintendo Switch OLED Model with White Joy-Con for $270, a discount from its original price of $349.

articles.title: Walmart slashes price on OLED Nintendo Switch model ahead of Switch 2 release - Save $80
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Nintendo Switch – OLED Model w/ White Joy-Con on sale ahead of the Nintendo Switch 2 release. The upgraded Switch features a vibrant 7-inch OLED display, versatile play modes, enhanced audio and storage, and a sleek white design. The Nintendo Switch 2 is anticipated to cost $449 and expected to drop by June 5.

articles.title: Karnataka govt's 6.2 crore deal with Tamannaah Bhatia for KSDL endorsement draws flak: ‘When Kannada actresses like…'
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL), manufacturer of Mysore Sandal Soap, has appointed Tamannaah Bhatia as its brand ambassador for two years at a cost of Rs 6.2 crore. This decision is a strategic move to aggressively penetrate markets beyond Karnataka and achieve an annual revenue of Rs 5,000 crore by 2028.

articles.title: SwitchBot Lock Ultra review: Big upgrades, smaller form factor
articles.summary: SwitchBot launched the SwitchBot Lock Ultra, a retrofit smart lock, which is an upgrade to the original SwitchBot Lock Pro. The SwitchBot Lock Ultra is crafted from magnesium aluminum alloy and replaces only the interior portion of your deadbolt hardware, making installation quick.

articles.title: Amazon trials genAI-powered audio summaries for product pages
articles.author: Vishnu Priya N
articles.summary: Amazon is testing a new generative AI feature that creates short-form audio summaries on product detail pages. This feature analyzes product details, customer reviews, and online information to provide concise product overviews. The audio summaries are currently available to a limited group of US customers via the 'Hear the highlights' button in the Amazon shopping app, with plans for wider rollout.

articles.title: Dyson's new super-slim vacuum has surprising features I've never seen before
articles.author: Alex Aitcheson-David
articles.summary: Dyson is set to launch the new Dyson PencilVac in the UK in 2026. The PencilVac is a cordless vacuum featuring a hidden dustbin, a slim design (38mm), and Dyson's smallest motor to date. It also includes features like fluffycones to prevent hair wrap and lasers to illuminate dust.

articles.title: Save big on thousands of items by shopping Nordstrom's Half Yearly Sale
articles.author: Nina Derwin
articles.summary: Nordstrom is having a Half-Yearly Sale through June 1, offering up to 60% off on various items, including apparel from brands like Good American, Mother, and Madewell, as well as shoes from Rothy's and Hoka. The sale also includes beauty products like the Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer and MAC Cosmetics, and home items from Le Creuset and Barefoot Dreams.

articles.title: The Best Dyson Vacuums (2025), Tested and Reviewed
articles.author: Brenda Stolyar
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the new PencilVac vacuum cleaner in Japan and Korea, featuring a slim design, conical brush bar cleaner head, new Dyson Hyperdymium 140k motor, and connectivity to the MyDyson app. The PencilVac promises an hour of battery life and compacts dust in its small dustbin. The article also mentions the Dyson Gen5outsize and Dyson V11 models.

articles.title: ‘Are there no Kannada actors?': Appointment of Tamannaah as Mysore Sandal Soap brand ambassador sparks outrage
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) appointed Tamannaah Bhatia as the brand ambassador for Mysore Sandal Soap. This is a strategic initiative to expand the product's market reach beyond Karnataka. KSDL aims to establish the brand as a national leader in the personal care segment and achieve an annual revenue of ₹5,000 crore by 2028.

articles.title: I tried the new Ninja Creami Swirl that users are calling 'a dessert game changer' - Here's my honest review
articles.author: JULIA REMILLARD
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Ninja Creami Swirl in February 2025, an upgraded version of the Ninja Creami ice cream maker. This new model features 13 modes, including a soft serve function and a handle dispenser, enhancing the user experience. It is available for purchase on Ninja's website, Amazon, and Best Buy for $350.

articles.title: JKR Has Built the World's Most Distinctive Brands. Now It's Building the World's Most Distinctive Branding Business.
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: JKR, a global branding agency, has expanded its Experience offering, led by Sam Smith and Matt Michaluk, to address the evolving needs of brands. Additionally, Melanie McShane has been appointed as the first-ever Executive Strategy Director to elevate strategic excellence. These moves aim to provide clients with comprehensive brand-building solutions and drive growth.

articles.title: I/O 2025: Google showcases new AI-powered 'Try it on' shopping feature
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Google unveiled its AI-powered 'Try it on' shopping feature at the I/O 2025 event, which allows users to virtually try on clothes using the Google Search app by uploading a photo. Initially available in the US through Search Labs, Google plans to expand the feature to more markets in the coming months.

articles.title: Larry Magid: In search of a perfect robotic vacuum cleaner, mop
articles.author: Larry Magid
articles.summary: Eufy has introduced the Robot Vacuum Omni E28, a robotic cleaner that vacuums, mops, and deep cleans furniture. The E28 features self-emptying, mop cleaning capabilities, and a portable deep cleaner, and retails for $999.

articles.title: Next's 'comfortable' midi smock dress with pockets is 'nice and cool for summer'
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Next has launched 100% Cotton Jersey Midi Smock Dresses, sold in packs of two for £45 and available in sizes eight to 18. The dresses, made from 100% cotton, feature a round neckline, short sleeves, and concealed side pockets. They are available in various color combinations and patterns.

articles.title: London digital PR firm celebrates eight years of industry evolution
articles.author: Dre Carter
articles.summary: Magic PR's The News Front platform, launched in 2018, has reached its eight-year anniversary. The platform has evolved to incorporate AI-driven tools that convert written content into multiple formats and now hosts content spanning 43 industry categories. The News Front also received Google News approval.

articles.title: Karnataka Govt Appoints Tamannaah Bhatia as KSDL Brand Ambassador
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Limited (KSDL) has appointed Tamannaah Bhatia as the brand ambassador for Mysore Sandal Soap. This decision aims to penetrate markets beyond Karnataka aggressively, with a vision to reach an annual revenue of Rs 5,000 crore by 2028.

articles.title: Nvidia GeForce Now six-month subs are 40 percent off
articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.summary: Nvidia is offering a 40% discount on six-month subscriptions to its GeForce Now Performance tier, reducing the price to $29.99. GeForce Now is also launching soon on the Steam Deck platform. This allows users to stream games with enhanced visual fidelity not possible on the Steam Deck's native hardware.

articles.title: ZHITAI, YMTC's Retail Storage Brand, Set for COMPUTEX Taipei 2025 Debut  May. 22, 2025 14:00
articles.summary: ZHITAI, a retail storage brand of YMTC, is launching new products including the TiPro9000 SSD, featuring PCIe 5.0 and Xtacking® 4.0 architecture, and the TiPlus7100 SSD "Black Myth: Wukong" Collaboration Edition. The company also offers a range of portable SSDs and memory cards designed for users needing versatile storage solutions and cross-device transfers.

articles.title: Longzon Unveils zForge Electric Rolling Knife Sharpener with Exclusive Deals on Amazon and TikTok Shop
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: Longzon launched the zForge Electric Rolling Knife Sharpener, available on Amazon and TikTok Shop. The zForge features industrial-grade diamond discs and adjustable angles for sharpening knives. It is priced at $39.99 with a 70% discount for a limited time.

articles.title: This powerful vacuum works wonders — and it's less than $50
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: BLACK+DECKER is promoting its Dustbuster Cordless Handheld Vacuum as a lightweight, cordless cleaning solution. The Dustbuster features powerful lithium suction, a translucent dirt bowl, and washable filters, and is designed to handle everyday messes, with a focus on ease of use and accessibility.

articles.title: Sol de Janeiro Launches Body Badalada™ Vitamin-Infused Lotion as a First at Sephora Global Exclusive
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro has launched Body Badalada™ Vitamin-Infused Lotion, a product designed for Gen Z and available exclusively at Sephora globally. This lotion promises 24-hour hydration with the Cheirosa 62™ scent and is launching with a creator-led campaign featuring Juliana Nalú, Bretman Rock, Samyra Miller, and Nick Pauley.

articles.title: Concentrix Launches iX Hero™ Agentic AI Apps to Solve Critical Pain Points of the Customer ...
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Concentrix Corporation launched iX Hero, an AI-powered application designed to enhance customer experience, as the latest addition to its Intelligent Experience (IX) suite. iX Hero enhances customer experience delivery, addressing both quick fixes and complex questions. It works with human agents to make customer interactions more efficient.

articles.title: Google's most powerful AI tools aren't for us
articles.author: Igor Bonifacic
articles.summary: At I/O 2025, Google introduced AI Mode, generative AI apps Jules and Flow, and a $250 per month AI Ultra plan. The company is also bringing live language translation to Google Meet. Google showcased Android XR platform as well.

articles.title: One in six North West homes don't have a garden making outdoor laundry drying impossible
articles.author: Jill Jones
articles.summary: Ebac, a British manufacturer, has launched LaundryDri, a compact and portable clothes drying solution. It utilizes advanced air circulation and patented defrost technology to gently dry clothes while preserving their quality and being energy-efficient. The product is designed as a convenient and cost-effective alternative to tumble dryers and radiator drying.

articles.title: One in six North West homes don't have a garden making outdoor laundry drying impossible
articles.author: Jill Jones
articles.summary: British manufacturer Ebac has launched LaundryDri, a compact, quiet, and portable solution for drying clothes indoors. LaundryDri uses air circulation and patented defrost technology to gently remove moisture from fabrics, offering an energy-efficient and convenient alternative to tumble dryers and radiator drying.

articles.title: Sephora fans swoon over juicy mango perfume that's better than Jo Malone's take
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: Fugazzi has launched a new fragrance called "Magic Mango," which is exclusively available at Sephora. It is described as a juicy and woody mango scent with notes of nutmeg, clove, leather, saffron, moss, and amber, available in multiple sizes, including a 50ml bottle for £80. Reviewers have compared it favorably to Jo Loves Mango Thai Lime, highlighting its mature and unconventional blend.

articles.title: Google's AI Advantage: Knowing You – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google is leveraging its ecosystem of services to personalize AI experiences, aiming to provide relevant and insightful AI responses by integrating user data from services like Gmail and Drive. Google's Gemini is highlighted as a data-driven AI, integrating user data to improve contextual understanding, which can be considered an update to their existing AI product/service.

articles.title: Azerion Launches Open and Independent Multi-Cloud and AI Platform
articles.author: Azerion Group NV
articles.summary: Azerion has launched Azerion Intelligence, a new Multi-Cloud and AI platform designed to offer European businesses affordable and independent cloud hosting, access to open-source AI capabilities, and a marketplace of AI-powered apps tailored for digital marketing and publishing. The platform provides access to leading open-source large language models and ready-to-use AI applications, aiming to democratize AI for European businesses.

articles.title: [Copy] 5 Plants That Keep Mosquitoes and Pests Out of Your Home
articles.summary: Cetaphil offers Gentle Skin Cleanser (₦22,325 at Shop TOS Nigeria). Neutrogena presents Norwegian Formula Hand Cream (₦5,800 at Shop Allure Beauty Store). Eucerin provides Sun Protection Cream SPF 50+ (₦29,900 at Shop Buy Better). Palmer's offers Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturizing Hand Cream ($4.49 at Shop Amazon). Aveeno features Daily Moisturising Hand Cream.

articles.title: Google introduces SynthID Detector to identify AI-generated content at Google I/O 2025
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google introduced SynthID Detector, a verification portal to identify AI-generated content, at Google I/O 2025. The portal scans uploaded media created with Google's AI tools for a SynthID watermark, highlighting watermarked portions. Google has begun rolling out SynthID Detector to early testers and expects wider access soon.

The Nostalgia margarita and slush machine, originally purchased for $100, is being resold for $80 after only one use by an individual who decided to pursue a different approach. The machine is relatively new.

articles.title: Digital Twin Consortium Announces Digital Twin Testbed Program
articles.summary: The Digital Twin Consortium (DTC) announced the launch of its Digital Twin Testbed Program. New member-led testbeds include contributions from Dassault Systèmes focusing on simulating production lines with Digital Twins, AxoMem embedding GenAI agents into healthcare digital twin systems, XMPro expanding digital twins through multi-agent generative systems, NEC Corporation integrating negotiation AI with digital twins, Crysp modernizing compliance through AI-driven digital twins, Oak Ridge High School integrating digital twins in a smart factory, Rowan University evaluating digital twins in metal additive manufacturing, and Decimetrix demonstrating AI-ready digital twins in geothermal operations.

articles.title: New Google AI Feature: Ads in AI Overviews launched for Sub-Sahara businesses
articles.author: Adeola Balogun
articles.summary: Google announced new AI-powered advertising and commerce innovations at Google Marketing Live (GML) 2025, including Ads in AI Overviews, new AI Marketing Assistants, Image-to-Video Transformation, and AI Outpainting features. These tools are designed to help businesses enhance their online presence and drive tangible growth, with new features centralized in Asset Studio within Google Ads.

articles.title: AI Commercials Arrive – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Netflix plans to introduce AI-powered interactive ads by 2026, designed to be contextually relevant and engaging. YouTube is leveraging Google's Gemini AI model to identify 'Peak Points' in videos, optimizing ad placement for maximizing viewer attention and minimizing disruption. These AI-driven strategies aim to enhance advertising relevance and engagement for viewers on both platforms.

articles.title: SwitchBot Lock Ultra review: Big upgrades, smaller form factor
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: SwitchBot has launched the SwitchBot Lock Ultra, an upgraded version of its retrofit smart lock. The Lock Ultra features easier installation, a rechargeable battery, and improved design compared to the previous Lock Pro model. Optional keypads, including the new Keypad Vision with NFC and facial recognition, are available to extend external access capabilities.

articles.title: Tamannaah Bhatia to Promote Mysore Sandal Soap in Rs 6.2 Cr Deal
articles.author: Sowmya Sangam
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps and Detergents Ltd. (KSDL) has appointed actress Tamannaah Bhatia as the brand ambassador for Mysore Sandal Soap and related products, with a two-year agreement valued at Rs 6.2 crore. This endorsement aims to boost brand visibility and consumer engagement across markets through media campaigns featuring the actress.

articles.title: Amazon's AI voiceovers will talk you through product features
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Amazon is testing new AI-generated audio summaries on its mobile app for select products like Ninja Blender, OSEA Undaria Algae Body Oil, SHOKZ OpenRun Pro, and SafeRest Waterproof Mattress Protector. These audio clips, featuring AI 'hosts,' summarize product features using details from user reviews and web information. Amazon plans to expand this feature to more products and customers in the coming months.

articles.title: Elon Musk calls this Tesla product 'the biggest ever'
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk showcased the company's Optimus robot performing tasks like stirring a pot, vacuuming, and cleaning a table. These demonstrations highlight advancements since the initial prototype in 2022 and exemplify Tesla's focus on AI-powered home assistance and expressive robotic movements.

articles.title: 10 Best Body Wash Brands: Get Clean And Hydrated Skin For Summer
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works offers a body wash enriched with Pro Vitamin B5 and aloe, featuring notes of vanilla, white orchid, and jasmine. Dove body washes provides almond cream and hibiscus extract variants for skin moisturization and cleaning. Treaclemoon introduces a vegan body wash with natural coconut extracts in recycled packaging for effective skin cleaning and hydration.

articles.title: Twin Vee PowerCats Launches Wizz Banger to Revolutionize Boat Buying and Selling with AI-Powered Marketplace
articles.summary: Twin Vee PowerCats Co. has launched Wizz Banger, an AI-powered marine commerce platform designed to modernize boat sales through BoatsForSale.com. Wizz Banger utilizes AI tools to analyze boat listings, automate responses, and provide pricing strategies, aiming to deliver a more transparent buying and selling experience.

articles.title: REVIEW: Omoda C5 X will hit a sweet spot for those who prefer sporty looks to practicality
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Omoda has launched the facelifted Omoda C5 X model, which has been split into two models with the Lux X costing R425,900 and the Elegance X commanding R465,900. The new model features a sharper 'diamond matrix' grille, larger headlights, and boomerang-shaped bumper elements. The boot capacity has been increased from 378 to 442 litres and the previous CVT gearbox has been replaced by a new six-speed dual-clutch unit.

articles.title: How to get the best mobile phone deals whatever your budget
articles.summary: Vodafone has deals on the Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max 256GB, offering savings up to £360 on Airtime. They also have a deal on the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra 256GB, saving up to £576 on Airtime with a 24-month 5GB Xtra Airtime Plan. There's also a Google Pixel 9a 128GB deal with savings up to £480 on airtime on a 36-month Phone Plan with a 24-month 5GB Airtime Plan, and a SIMO Unlimited deal, with unlimited data half price for the first six months.

articles.title: Dyson launches ‘world's slimmest' vacuum cleaner PencilVac: What you need to know
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Dyson has globally launched its slimmest vacuum cleaner, the PencilVac, featuring the new Dyson Hyperdymium 140k motor and Fluffycones brush bars. This cordless vacuum cleaner includes a new filtration system and can be managed via the MyDyson app.

articles.title: Midwest Plumbing Opens Second Office in Lakewood, Colorado
articles.author: Access Newswire
articles.summary: Midwest Plumbing Co. LLC has announced the grand opening of a new location in Lakewood, Colorado. This expansion aims to serve more customers across the Denver Metro Area, providing residential and commercial plumbing services. The company continues to offer a range of plumbing solutions.

articles.title: 31 Things Probably Designed By Geniuses May 2025
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: InStyler is launching a hot brush with a large paddle and ceramic heaters for faster hair straightening, priced at $79.99. JetKids is introducing a ride-on carry-on suitcase designed for toddlers to ride on and function as a leg rest. Also, a shelf with built-in dimmable lights designed to highlight decorations and home accessories is being introduced.

articles.title: Taco Bell introduces Mike's Hot Honey Diablo Sauce
articles.author: Fielding Buck
articles.summary: Taco Bell is launching a new dipping sauce specifically designed for its Crispy Chicken Nuggets. The collaboration introduces a new flavor option for customers.

articles.title: Taco Bell introduces Mike's Hot Honey Diablo Sauce
articles.author: Fielding Buck
articles.summary: Taco Bell is introducing a new dipping sauce as a result of a collaboration. The sauce is specifically designed for Taco Bell's Crispy Chicken Nuggets.

articles.title: Glance Launches AI-native Commerce Platform
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Glance, a consumer technology company, launched Glance AI, an AI-native commerce platform for online shopping. This platform utilizes proprietary AI models to enable users to discover AI-curated looks. Glance AI is available globally as a standalone app on both the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.

articles.title: 'Flattering' Boden summer dress that 'won't crease' has £31 off
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Boden has released the Nina Smocked T-shirt Dress as part of its spring sale, offering a 25% discount. The dress, made from 100% cotton, comes in pink with colorful embroidery, multiple sizes and lengths. It is designed to be moisture-wicking and breathable, ideal for warm weather.

articles.title: The Budget-Friendly Hair Refresher: Top Dry Shampoos Under ₹500
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Eleganz offers a 100% natural dry shampoo with rice starch. BBLUNT features a refresh dry shampoo designed to add volume. Sanfe provides a hair volumizing dry shampoo suitable for oily hair. Hair Pure introduces Revive & Go Dry Shampoo, designed to volumize and control frizz.

articles.title: Gentle Care, Gentle on the Wallet: Top Baby Shampoos Under ₹200
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Parachute Advansed Baby Shampoo uses Virgin Coconut Oil and Tender Coconut Water to gently cleanse and nourish baby's hair. Baby Dove Rich Moisture Shampoo is designed for sensitive scalps and hair, providing gentle cleansing and care. Mothercare All We Know Baby Shampoo uses olive oil and chamomile to cleanse the scalp and leave hair naturally clean and shiny.

articles.title: Just 41 Travel Essentials That Won't Break The Bank
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Neutrogena introduces a solid SPF 50 sunscreen for travel, avoiding TSA liquid restrictions. I Dew Care launches a compact mattifying powder shampoo. Alleyoop introduces 3-in-1 travel razor and 4-in-1 Pen Pal for convenient on-the-go grooming.

articles.title: Google's New AI Tools Let People Try On Clothes and Shop Smarter
articles.author: Defara Dhanya
articles.summary: Google is launching a new virtual try-on feature for clothing using AI, allowing users to upload a photo to see how clothes look on them. Additionally, Google is introducing AI Mode, a Gemini-based search experience, for personalized product searches. Google also plans to launch an 'agentic checkout' feature where Google will complete transactions on the retailer's site using Google Pay.

articles.title: By putting AI into everything, Google wants to make it invisible
articles.author: Will Douglas Heaven
articles.summary: Google is bundling multimodal models, including Imagen 4 and Veo 3, into the Gemini app, providing access to generative models via a single chatbot. They also announced Gemini Live, allowing users to share their screen or camera view with the chatbot. Google is also rolling out AI Mode, an LLM-powered front end to search.

articles.title: The Download: Google's AI mission, and America's reliance on natural gas
articles.author: Rhiannon Williams
articles.summary: Google I/O showcased Google's upcoming products, highlighting the integration of AI. The event signals the introduction or update of products and services incorporating AI technologies.

articles.title: A Skincare Essential for the Urban Hustler: Hydrate, Protect & Prep with Every Step
articles.author: Initiative Desk
articles.summary: Neutriderm has launched the Pre Make-up Skincare Combo in India, featuring a Dermavive Hydra Cleanser and Neutriderm Moisturising Lotion made in Australia. The combo hydrates and protects skin, serving as a pre-makeup base suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and acne-prone skin.

articles.title: Google Confirms DeX-Like Desktop Experience For Android 16, Asks Developers To Embrace Adaptive App Designs
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: Google confirmed that Android 16 will come with desktop windowing, enabling a true desktop-like experience on connected screens. This announcement occurred at the Google I/O 2025 developer conference. Google is also collaborating with Samsung to build upon the foundations laid by Samsung DeX.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Galaxy S25 Edge: A Slim Marvel Now Made in India
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Samsung launched its Galaxy S25 Edge handset in India, manufactured domestically at its Noida plant. The phone, unveiled globally in May, features multimodal AI powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform and is priced between Rs 1.09 lakh and Rs 1.22 lakh.

articles.title: Introducing Cleo: The Newest Innovation in Mascara Design
articles.summary: Cleo has launched Cleo Wand, a revolutionary one-piece mascara wand designed for simplified makeup application. The wand eliminates common frustrations like misplaced wands and clumping, offering a seamless and mess-free experience. Cleo Wand is now available for preview at cleowand.com.

articles.title: Luft Pay TV revolutionizes entertainment with Lagos launch
articles.author: Ruth Tene Natsa
articles.summary: Luft Pay TV launched its new Pay TV service in Nigeria on May 20, 2025, offering over 35 premium channels for ₦7,500 per month. The service includes various content from Sports to Movies and focuses on promoting local content through partnerships with indigenous content creators. The decoder costs ₦25,000, and the complete STB kit costs ₦35,000.

articles.title: 53 Must-Have Beauty Products Under $30
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: E.l.f. launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara with a unique formula and Halo Glow Liquid Filter for a dewy makeup effect. Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash, a body wash version of their facial serum, while Nyx launched Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum as a 3-in-1 lip product. EOS released Shea Butter Vanilla Cashmere body lotion with a scent comparable to luxury brands.

articles.title: Jony Ive's AI Product 'Third Core Device' After MacBook and iPhone
articles.author: Tim Hardwick
articles.summary: A startup co-created by Jony Ive and OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is launching a new product, described as a "third core device" intended to wean people off screens. The device is neither glasses nor a phone.

articles.title: How Creators Are Building 7-Figure Products, Without Millions Of Views
articles.author: Ian Shepherd
articles.summary: The article highlights how creators are increasingly launching their own products and services. Examples include Squidmar's successful Kickstarter for brushes and busts, and James Hoffmann's coffee accessories. A report indicates that 88% of creators have launched a product/service, with 93% planning to within a year.

articles.title: So Klin unveils first-ever smart liquid detergent in Nigeria
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: So Klin has launched its innovative Smart Liquid Detergent in Nigeria, available in Intense Perfume and Intense Cleaning Formula variants. The detergent is positioned as the first liquid detergent produced in Nigeria, priced at ₦100, and offers enhanced cleaning and fragrance benefits. The product launch event included live demonstrations and consumer engagement, emphasizing the brand's commitment to innovation.

articles.title: Naver launches open beta of AI-powered advertising solution
articles.author: Bskim 힐링타임
articles.summary: Naver Corp has launched ADVoost Shopping, an AI-powered solution that automates the setup and management of shopping ad campaigns. This platform streamlines advertising on Naver Shopping by automating campaign creation and ad placement, increasing advertising effectiveness across Naver's services.

articles.title: NI software company agrees deal with European firm worth more than £1m
articles.author: James McNaney
articles.summary: Allsop has integrated a dynamic pricing module into a distributor's operations to ensure competitive pricing. The module uses artificial intelligence to improve efficiencies, productivity, and sales revenue. Invest NI supports Allsop's AI platform, enabling the company to expand its customer base and sales in Great Britain and Europe.

articles.title: Netflix to end support for these devices from June 2: Know if you'll be affected
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Netflix is ending app support for first-generation Amazon Fire TV devices starting June 2, 2025. Amazon is promoting the latest generation Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K, now available with an 18% discount and Alexa Voice Remote, as an upgrade option for affected users.

articles.title: Leerdammer moves into spreadable cheese with new line
articles.author: Kevin White
articles.summary: Lactalis UK & Ireland has launched Leerdammer Original Spreadable, marking the brand's entry into the spreadable cheese category. The product, priced at £1.90/125g, is now available in Morrisons and Ocado. This expansion aims to broaden the brand's appeal and introduce Leerdammer's signature flavor in a versatile format.

articles.title: Glance launches new AI powered shopping app with virtual try-on and personalised suggestions
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Glance launched Glance AI, an AI-powered app on May 22nd designed to enhance the online shopping experience by offering personalized product recommendations based on uploaded images or selfies. The app utilizes advanced AI models to display products from over 400 brands and is initially focused on fashion, with plans to expand to other categories like accessories, beauty, and travel later in the year.

articles.title: If AI eats search, Google is still all in: Morning Brief
articles.author: Hamza Shaban
articles.summary: Google is introducing AI Mode, a new chatbot-style search option built into the Google Search page. AI Mode offers a back-and-forth conversation, synthesis of detailed research, and help with shopping and logistics. This new feature is designed to integrate AI into the search experience and compete with other AI companies.

articles.title: Dozens of Premium Publishers Join Adelaide's New ‘AU Ecosystem'
articles.author: Mark Stenberg
articles.summary: Adelaide has launched the AU Ecosystem, a marketplace combining tools and services for media buyers and sellers to transact based on media quality. Premium publishers like The New York Times and Spotify have joined the ecosystem at launch. The AU Ecosystem facilitates attention-based transactions through offerings like sponsorship of AU measurement, inventory audits, high-AU curation, and AU guarantees.

articles.title: Glance AI Launches AI-Native Commerce Platform Built on Deep Commerce Intelligence and Hyper-Real Visual Shopping
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Glance, backed by Google, has unveiled Glance AI, an AI-native commerce platform. This platform is designed to revolutionize online shopping, shifting it from search-based to inspiration-led discovery. It introduces the concept of the 'AI consumer,' where technology proactively understands and anticipates shopping desires.

articles.title: 40 Problem-Solvers With Magical Before-And-After Pics
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The article presents numerous new cleaning and personal care products designed to simplify household tasks and improve personal hygiene. Highlights include a suede brush for restoring leather, biotin shampoo for thickening hair, a shoe stretch spray, tongue scrapers, and dishwasher cleaning tablets. The article also introduces a variety of innovative products like the Chom Chom roller, PhoneSoap sanitizer, and Dawn Powerwash spray.

articles.title: Dyson unveils world's slimmest vacuum cleaner PencilVac with conical brush bars and app connectivity
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Dyson PencilVac, the world's slimmest vacuum cleaner, in Japan. The PencilVac features a Fluffycones cleaner head with conical brush bars, a Hyperdymium 140k motor, a two-stage linear dust separation system, and app connectivity via the MyDyson app.

articles.title: 'Our goal is to empower our clients through intelligent technology': Belfast software company secures £1.2m European deal as AI software gains traction across borders
articles.author: Claire Cartmill
articles.summary: Allsop secured a £1.2 million contract to provide a dynamic pricing module, a new service, to a leading European food distributor. This module aims to ensure competitive pricing and efficient customer inquiry responses, representing Allsop's goal to empower clients through intelligent technology.

articles.title: Bank of Baroda UAE Partners with In-Solutions Global to Launch Jaywan Cards in UAE
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: ISG & Bank of Baroda UAE are launching Jaywan Card at Seamless 2025. Jaywan's interoperability with RuPay provides a seamless cross-border experience.

articles.title: Belfast software firm lands £1.2m contract with leading European food distributor
articles.summary: Allsop, a software company, secured a £1.2 million contract with a leading European food distributor to integrate a dynamic pricing module into their operations. This solution aims to help the distributor ensure competitive pricing and respond efficiently to customer inquiries, supported by Invest NI's research and development funding.

articles.title: 34 Must-Try Asian Food And Drink Brands To Stock Up On
articles.author: Brittney Trinh
articles.summary: Wildwonder collaborated with Le Mini Macaron to launch a limited-edition Cherry Lemonade drink and a nail polish trio with nail stickers. MiLa, a modern Chinese food brand, recently added potsticker-style dumplings, expanding upon their delicious soup, noodles, and sauces. Nguyen Coffee Supply is collaborating with Sprinkles Cupcake to create a Vietnamese Coffee cupcake available from May 13th-26th.

articles.title: Reddit Expands Dynamic Ads to All Advertisers
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Reddit has made its Dynamic Product Ads available to all advertisers, enabling them to display relevant products from their catalog alongside subreddit conversations. This service auto-populates ads in real-time and allows retargeting based on user engagement. Additionally, Reddit announced a new integration with Smartly, a multi-channel ad platform, enabling advertisers to manage Reddit campaigns alongside other channels.

articles.title: Mint Explainer: What does Zepto's Swap and Save mean for brands' relationship with quick commerce platforms?
articles.author: Sakshi Sadashiv
articles.summary: Zepto has introduced 'Swap and Save,' a new quick-commerce service that suggests cheaper product options to customers at checkout. This aims to clear slow-moving or near-expiry inventory and build customer trust by offering savings. The service is currently in testing phase and company is still collecting feedback.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review: Samsung's Slimmest Yet Is a Luxury, But Not a Necessity
articles.author: Priya Pathak
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a design-focused smartphone with a remarkably thin profile and high-end specs, including a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, and a 200MP main camera. This model targets users who prioritize aesthetics and a premium feel, while performance and camera capabilities remain strong, battery life is average.

articles.title: Google rolls out SynthID detector, a platform to identify AI-generated content more efficiently
articles.summary: Google is expanding its SynthID technology with the launch of SynthID Detector, a new tool designed to detect AI-generated content produced using Google's tools, including text, video, and audio created with models like Gemini, Imagen, Lyria, and Veo. Users can upload material to the portal, which then scans for SynthID watermarks to verify its AI origin.

articles.title: Google introduces Stitch AI-powered tool for app design and development at Google I/O 2025
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Google introduced 'Stitch,' a new AI-powered tool, at its annual developer conference Google I/O 2025. This tool aims to bridge the gap between design and development.

articles.title: Swiggy launches ‘Drops' for limited-edition dishes by top chefs
articles.author: ETtech
articles.summary: Swiggy has launched 'Drops,' a new feature offering customers exclusive, limited-edition dishes created by leading chefs. Partner restaurants develop unique recipes, and launch dates are announced on social media. The service is currently live in select cities.

articles.title: Best semi automatic washing machines in 2025: Top 10 picks from LG, Samsung, Whirlpool and more
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: The article presents a selection of semi-automatic washing machines from brands like LG, Samsung, Whirlpool, Panasonic, Voltas Beko, Haier, Godrej, and Midea. It details features such as capacity, RPM, wash programs, and special technologies, alongside buyer feedback from Amazon, to inform potential customers.

articles.title: ZHITAI, YMTC's Retail Storage Brand, Set for COMPUTEX Taipei 2025 Debut
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: ZHITAI, a retail brand of YMTC, has launched several new storage products. These include the TiPro9000 PCIe 5.0 SSD featuring Xtacking® 4.0 architecture, the TiPlus7100 SSD "Black Myth: Wukong" Collaboration Edition, the SPIRIT PREMIUM Portable SSD, and the PRO MicroSD Card with Adapter. These new product offerings showcase ZHITAI's commitment to providing high-performance, high-quality storage solutions for diverse user needs.

articles.title: Realme copying Nothing? Neo7 Turbo's transparent design sparks debate
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Realme has unveiled its upcoming Neo7 Turbo smartphone, showcasing a Transparent Grey edition with a design similar to Nothing's. The phone, powered by MediaTek's Dimensity 9400e chipset, is set to debut in China on May 29 and features a 1.5K flat display, a 7,000mAh battery with 100W fast charging, and a 50MP Sony IMX882 camera system.

articles.title: ZHITAI, YMTC's Retail Storage Brand, Set for COMPUTEX Taipei 2025 Debut
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: ZHITAI, YMTC's retail storage brand, is launching new products, including the TiPro9000 SSD, a PCIe 5.0 SSD with up to 4TB capacity and speeds of up to 14,000MB/s read and 12,500MB/s write, and the TiPlus7100 SSD "Black Myth: Wukong" Collaboration Edition with HMB and SLC Cache technology. These products are aimed at professional creators and gamers, showcasing ZHITAI's commitment to high-performance storage solutions.

articles.title: ZHITAI, YMTC's Retail Storage Brand, Set for COMPUTEX Taipei 2025 Debut
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: YMTC's retail brand, ZHITAI, is showcasing its storage solutions, including SSDs, portable SSDs, and memory cards, at COMPUTEX Taipei 2025.  Flagship products include the TiPro9000 SSD, featuring PCIe 5.0 and Xtacking® 4.0 architecture, and the TiPlus7100 SSD, which is also available as a 'Black Myth: Wukong' Collaboration Edition.

articles.title: New Windows feature would let you resume Android apps on your PC where you left them
articles.author: Daniel Sims
articles.summary: Microsoft is introducing a new feature called "Cross Device Resume" in Windows 11. This feature, detailed by Microsoft's Senior Product Manager Aakash Varshney, will allow users with Android phones to resume activities from supported mobile apps on their Windows PCs by clicking a badge on the taskbar. The feature is currently being tested by third-party developers.

articles.title: Dyson confirms very smart new vacuum and it's like nothing we've seen before
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the PencilVac, a slim vacuum cleaner measuring 38mm in diameter, featuring a Hyperdymium 140k motor and a laser head. The PencilVac includes a double brush bar, air-compressing bin, a small display, smartphone connectivity, and a magnetic dock.

articles.title: Fujifilm Introduces X half™ Premium Compact Digital Camera
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: FUJIFILM North America Corporation has launched the FUJIFILM X half premium compact digital camera, inspired by half-frame film cameras, with a compact size and light weight frame. The camera includes features like a dedicated smartphone application, direct printing to FUJIFILM instax smartphone printers, in-camera 2-in-1 feature, and Film Camera Mode.

articles.title: Fujifilm Introduces X half™ Premium Compact Digital Camera
org: Electronic Imaging and Optical Devices Divisions
articles.summary: FUJIFILM North America Corporation launched the FUJIFILM X half™ premium compact digital camera, inspired by half-frame film cameras. It will be available in late June 2025 with a Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price of $849.99 USD and $998.99 CAD.

articles.title: MG Motor Malaysia Announces MGS5 EV Pricing from Just RM109,900 With Exclusive Launch Savings
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: MG Motor Malaysia has launched its all-new MGS5 EV, a B-segment electric SUV, with prices starting at RM115,900. To celebrate the launch and their first anniversary in Malaysia, the first 500 buyers will receive RM6,000 in savings and a complimentary 7kW Wallbox AC charger, and a roadshow with test drives is being held at Mid Valley Megamall.

articles.title: 52 Easy Home Improvements You Can Do Yourself
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Several new products for home improvement and organization are introduced, including an oil stain remover, wood grain tape for mirrors, magnetic garage handles, a grout pen for floors, curtain rod brackets, concrete paint, a hanging shoe organizer, drywall repair putty, leather conditioner, door draft stopper, floating bookshelf, USB-powered LED light strip, wood scratch cover, self-adhesive film, under-cabinet lights, weather-resistant cedar pathway, fishing rod organizers, waterproof globe lights, rust-stopping paint, outdoor fabric spray paint, switch plates, outlet shelf, window film, metal kick plate, pumice stone toilet bowl cleaner, automatic bleach toilet cleaning system, interlocking teak tiles, electrical cord cover, faux ivy, stove burner covers, wood fillers, broom and mop organizer, lint brush, hammock chair, dog spot repair, standing weeder, night-light, water-mark-removing cloth, flower pots, perma-mulch, shed, outdoor rug, outdoor cleaner, umbrella light, picnic table covers, and a kitchen cabinet painting kit.

articles.title: Google unveils AI chatbot, signalling a new era for search
articles.author: Tripp Mickle
articles.summary: Google is introducing 'AI Mode,' a new AI-powered feature in its search engine that functions like a chatbot.  This launch also includes new AI abilities such as more personalized email replies and a shopping tool for automated clothing purchases.  AI Mode launched in the US on Tuesday and will not initially serve ads.

articles.title: Google releases its asynchronous Jules AI agent for coding - how to try it for free
articles.author: Webb Wright
articles.summary: Google has launched Jules, its new AI coding assistant, in public beta worldwide. Jules, originally unveiled in December, is designed to manage time-consuming coding tasks for human users and represents Google's effort to compete in the growing market for AI agents.

articles.title: 40 Products So Good You'll Want To Tell Everyone
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream with salicylic acid, glycerin, and aloe. A 3-in-1 wireless charger was released to simultaneously charge iPhones, Apple Watches, and AirPods. Also launched were hair-building fibers for a fuller look.

articles.title: Ai With Human Touch: How Startek Is Redefining Customer Experience Through Empathy And Automation
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: Startek is redefining customer experience by combining AI with human empathy, resulting in improved customer journeys. The company is expanding its capabilities in generative AI for intelligent self-service, call summarization, and real-time next-best-action modeling to future-proof CX strategies. Startek is also deepening its global presence to deliver relevant, responsive customer experiences.

articles.title: Android XR Glasses Get I/O 2025 Demo
articles.summary: At I/O 2025, Google revealed new details about Android.

articles.title: Amazing AI Shopping: Amazon Rolls Out AI Product Summaries
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing a new AI shopping feature. This move emphasizes the growing presence of artificial intelligence in consumer experiences.

articles.title: Naver announced on the 22nd that it will introduce "ADVoost Shopping," a solution that artificial in..
articles.author: Kim Tae-Sung
articles.summary: Naver introduced 'ADVoost Shopping,' an AI-driven solution that automates the entire process of online advertising for products registered on Naver Shopping. It automatically links products, selects materials, and determines ad placement, expanding ad reach beyond flagship products to include detailed product group information.

articles.title: Dyson PencilVac: As Thin as its Hair Dryer – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Dyson is introducing the PencilVac, the 'world's slimmest' vacuum cleaner, featuring a slim design and Fluffycone tangle-free technology. The PencilVac integrates with the MyDyson app and is designed primarily for hard floors, with a US launch anticipated in 2026.

articles.title: Dyson's new superskinny stick vac is as thin as its hair dryer
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Dyson has announced the launch of PencilVac, a slim vacuum cleaner designed for hard floors. The PencilVac features Fluffycones brush bars, a 28mm motor spinning at 140,000RPM, a two-stage dust filtration system, and connectivity to the MyDyson mobile app.

articles.title: This new super-slim Dyson vacuum is hiding a clever trick
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the PencilVac in 2026, a slim vacuum cleaner featuring a conical brush bar cleaner head to prevent hair tangling and a Hyperdymium motor. The PencilVac connects to the Dyson app for tracking and reminders, with an LCD screen displaying power mode and runtime.

articles.title: Google tackles privacy concerns with AI-powered virtual try-on feature
articles.author: Mathures Paul
articles.summary: Google has launched a new AI shopping feature as part of Search Labs that allows users to virtually try on clothes. Powered by a 'new custom image generation model for fashion', users can upload a photo of themselves and virtually try on dresses, shirts or boots. The feature is currently available only in the US as part of Search Labs.

articles.title: M&S hack attack will have tech firms ringing up the profits
articles.summary: M&S has launched its big summer sale, offering up to 50% off on clothing, home, and beauty products. The sale event is a promotional activity to boost sales on existing products.

articles.title: 25 Everyday Products To Stretch Your Dollar
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: Owala introduced a stainless-steel water bottle featuring a double-spout with a built-in straw and a leak-proof push-button opening. SwitchBot launched a gadget designed to turn appliances or light switches into smart devices.

articles.title: AI helps boost business development in China's Yiwu
articles.author: 新华网
articles.summary: Hongsheng Toys utilizes AI to create product-selling videos in 36 languages, adapting mouth movements for accurate pronunciation. This AI-powered approach has helped boost orders and reduce operational costs for the company.

articles.title: Oreo launches bold new flavor in surprise collab with celebrity icon
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Oreo is launching a new flavor, generating excitement among fans. The launch includes a child star.

articles.title: SK hynix develops new flash storage chip using 321-layer NAND
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: SK hynix Inc. has developed a mobile DRAM.

articles.title: I tried Google's new AI try-on feature, and it's given me some new fashion ideas
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Google launched 'Try It On,' a new AI-powered tool. This tool enables users to upload full-body photos to virtually try on clothes.

articles.title: San Juan Bautista relaunches downtown Sunday Farmers' Market
articles.author: Robert Eliason
articles.summary: The San Juan Bautista Farmers Market relaunched on May 18th, featuring fresh produce from local growers and new vendors. Cultiva Artistic Cuisine sells pressed juices along with produce, while Happy Place Baking offers baked goods. The market aims to create a community event showcasing local products.

articles.title: GenAI and Visual Search Are Reshaping Fashion Retail
articles.author: David Prosser
articles.summary: Glance introduces a new AI-powered shopping app that uses GenAI to generate clothing suggestions based on a user's selfie and preferences. The app directs users to partner retailers for purchase. Google also launched a 'virtual try-on' feature that enables people to upload a picture of themselves and then dress the picture in clothing that comes up in Google search results.

articles.title: Papa John's: How Technology, Quality, and Franchise Growth Keep It Thriving"
articles.author: Gary Occhiogrosso
articles.summary: Papa John's launched a loyalty enhancement in mid-November 2024 allowing customers to unlock Papa Dough faster.  The company is also focused on lowering the cost of building new restaurants and has achieved an average build cost of $515,000 per restaurant in the second half of 2024.

articles.title: Our Guide To The Best Washer & Dryer Combos In Canada In 2025 (And Where To Get Them)
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Samsung's 5.3 Cu. Ft. F900 Series Bespoke AI Laundry Combo is highlighted as a top product.

articles.title: My £249 Hoover is 'more effective' than a Dyson and reduced to £109 in Bank ...
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Shark's new product boasts 'double the suction power' compared to competitors. It features 'Anti-Twist technology,' similar to Shark's 'Anti Hair Wrap,' which automatically removes hair from the brush bar.

articles.title: Xiaomi launches new advanced in-house mobile chip
articles.author: Kuwait Times
articles.summary: Xiaomi unveiled a new advanced product.

articles.title: Amazon Shopping App Tries Out AI Audio Summaries To Ease Your Shopping Research
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: An e-commerce giant (implicitly Amazon) is currently testing a new audio feature called "hear the highlights." This feature is designed to describe products along with their customer reviews to the user.

articles.title: Norton's new Neo browser wants to bring AI to the search bar
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Norton launched a new 'free' browser, Neo, featuring AI prompting. This browser builds upon the existing functionalities of a URL bar, adding AI prompting to web address entry and search requests. Norton is known for its antimalware solutions like Norton 360 Deluxe.

articles.title: Ainos Showcases Breakthrough AI Nose Technology at COMPUTEX 2025 with Japan's Robotics Partner
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Ainos, Inc. launched a new AI-driven scent digitization technology at Asia's Premier AI Tech Stage. This gives machines the power to smell.

articles.title: Tiami, a New Luxury Mattress Brand from Industry Pioneers, Launches With Exclusive Design Within Reach Partnership
articles.author: The Ridgway Record
articles.summary: Founders of Leesa are launching a new mattress aimed at redefining the high-end sleep category. The mattress is being presented as a single, perfected product.

articles.title: Anthropic touts improved Claude AI models
articles.author: FABRICE COFFRINI
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched its latest Claude generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) models. These models are claimed to set new standards for reasoning, coding, and digital agent capabilities. The launch occurred during Anthropic's first developers conference.

articles.title: Chinese e-commerce platforms help exporters tap into domestic market
articles.author: Wang Ke
articles.summary: Tencent rolled out 10 support measures to help foreign trade enterprises broaden their access to domestic and international markets. JD.com plans to purchase at least 200 billion yuan worth of export-oriented products for domestic sales and launch a dedicated online zone, while Suning.com will hold offline consultation events and leverage its retail outlets to help foreign trade enterprises expand sales channels. Alibaba's Taobao and Tmall launched an initiative to support foreign trade merchants, and Meituan introduced green channels for merchant onboarding and will establish a dedicated zone for high-quality export products.
